author: Philip Jeyaretnam JC:
casenumber: General Division of the High Court — Originating Summons No 1113 of 2020 (Registrar’s Appeal No 83 of 2021)
casename: Malaysian Trustees Bhd v Tan Hock Keng
counsel: Ng Yeow Khoon, Claudia Marianne Frankie Khoo (Shook Lin & Bok LLP) for the plaintiff; Poon Guokun Nicholas, Tan Zhi Min Ashton (Breakpoint LLC) for the defendant.

headings.text: The defendant’s objections to registration of the consent judgment
Issue 1: Does Malaysian OS 455 amount to an appeal for the purpose of RECJA s 3(2)(e)?
Issue 2: Does registering the consent judgment prior to the final disposal of any appeal from Malaysian OS 455 violate public policy?
Issue 3: Does Malaysian OS 455 constitute a circumstance making it unjust or inconvenient to register the consent judgment?
